---
title: "blogdown"
---

```{r}
# 1. Install blogdown and load it
if (!requireNamespace("blogdown", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("blogdown")
}
library(blogdown)

# 2. Install Hugo if needed
blogdown::install_hugo(force = FALSE)

# 3. Create a new blogdown site in a temp folder 
new_site_dir <- file.path(tempdir(), "myblogdown_test")
blogdown::new_site(dir = new_site_dir, 
                   theme = "gcushen/hugo-academic",  
                   sample = TRUE,       
                   empty_dirs = TRUE)   

# Switch into the new site directory
setwd(new_site_dir)

# 4. Create a new post Rmd
blogdown::new_post(title = "blogdown Post",
                   ext = ".Rmd",
                   subdir = "post")   

# 5. Serve the site locally with live reload
blogdown::serve_site()

# 6. Build the full static site
blogdown::build_site()


message("blogdown test site is created at: ", new_site_dir)
message("To stop the local server, press Esc (or Ctrl+C in console).")

```
